fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / play pinball
fields.Condition: Variable["whirling.hidden_pinball_franconigerian"] == true  and  Variable["whirling.hidden_pinball_tip"] == true  and  IsKimHere()  and  Variable["whirling.orb_pinball_interfacing_done"] == false
fields.Description:
1. Let's play pinball.
2. Kim "Pinball" Kitsuragi back story.

fields.Title: START
input
You: "Kim 'Pinball' Kitsuragi, AKA Kimbal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Kim 'Pinball' Kitsuragi, AKA Kimball?

fields.Title: You: ""How did you...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How did you..."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Exactly. That's what he's known as...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Exactly. That's what he's known as. His reputation proceeds him!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It is *lame*.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It is *lame*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not only to you -- I am *Lieutenan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not only to you -- I am *Lieutenant Kitsuragi* to everyone." He nods. "Now -- we really need to continue our sweep of what appears to be a secret path through the Whirling."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. You're *gonna* call me Lieuten..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. You're *gonna* call me Lieutenant Kitsuragi -- or on rare occasions 'Kim', because it's shorter." He nods. "Let's go."

fields.Title: Volition: "Any plan to call him Pinball or Kim..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Any plan to call him Pinball or Kimball is immediately wiped from your neocortex, as if with some sort of mind altering device. It is simply not going to happen.

fields.Title: You: ""Let's move on then." [Finish thoug..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's move on then." [Finish thought.]

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Of course, of course. Just somethin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Of course, of course. Just something that swam to the surface. Go on, do real police work. This isn't a pinball mystery.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm gonna call you Pinball now.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm gonna call you Pinball now."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's best if *you* handle the juve..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's best if *you* handle the juvenile delinquents," he nods.

fields.Title: Untitled hub
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay." He thinks for a moment. "I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay." He thinks for a moment. "I don't like pinball because I had to learn to play it for an undercover job at a pinball ring. And it's a lame, boring, and unchallenging game -- there. We can move on now."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "You still feel he's holding out on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You still feel he's holding out on Seolite pinball tricks, but fine. Explore on then.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Untitled hub]
You: ""You're Lieutenant Kitsuragi to me.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're Lieutenant Kitsuragi to me."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "All these mesmerizing machines, jus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: All these mesmerizing machines, just waiting to be plugged back in and played.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So *now* he remembers..." He looks..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So *now* he remembers..." He looks at you in the silence of the workshop -- then takes his glasses off and cleans them.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Wonderful. He *only* remembers hea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wonderful. He *only* remembers hearing about the *pinball policeman*."

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, so *that's* why you didn't t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, so *that's* why you didn't talk to Cuno."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Kim 'Pinball' Kitsuragi!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Kim 'Pinball' Kitsuragi!

fields.Title: Suggestion: "He also really doesn't want to talk..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He also really doesn't want to talk about it.

fields.Title: Empathy: "The lieutenant grimaces, looking at..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant grimaces, looking at the machines.

fields.Title: Variable["whirling.kim_pinball_rc"]
Variable["whirling.kim_pinball_rc"]
!(Variable["whirling.kim_pinball_rc"])
Volition: "Super. Tip-top! This went pretty we..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Super. Tip-top! This went pretty well all things considered.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I am not *called* Pinball. It was..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am not *called* Pinball. It was used to taunt me -- a long time ago. *Before* I became a homicide detective. And got my lieutenancy."

fields.Title: You: ""No matter. This is a failure. I'm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No matter. This is a failure. I'm failing and I'm going to stop."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But even *I* know that they don't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But even *I* know that they don't play pinball. They have a rigid class society, and a punitive justice system..." He looks around. "We should continue with our exploration of this place. It doesn't matter."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay." He thinks for a moment. "I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay." He thinks for a moment. "I don't like pinball because I had to learn to play it for an undercover job at a pinball ring. And it's a lame, boring, and unchallenging game -- there. We can move on now."

fields.Title: You: ""So you're not all, like, pinball a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So you're not all, like, pinball aces? Because I could swear I know you are."

fields.Title: You: "I'm not gonna talk to him about tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm not gonna talk to him about that.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Deora was one of the three *Crown C..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Deora was one of the three *Crown Cities* of the Dolorian era, on the Mundi isola -- the others being Rheasilvia and Advesperascit. This theme is all about early airships and beautiful, sad, pearl-laden women. It's quite nice actually.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You can't *fire* them up, they're..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You can't *fire* them up, they're broken. Only that one machine in the main hall works. The Royalist Pinball." He looks away.

fields.Title: You: "Think: Kim Kitsuragi... Kim Kitsura..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Think: Kim Kitsuragi... Kim Kitsuragi...

fields.Title: Variable["whirling.kim_pinball_rc"]
Variable["whirling.kim_pinball_rc"]
!(Variable["whirling.kim_pinball_rc"])
Jump to: [Untitled hub]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Lieutenant Kitsuragi is good too."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lieutenant Kitsuragi is good too." He nods. "Now -- we really need to continue our sweep of what appears to be a secret path through the Whirling."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Untitled hub]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fine. I'm Kim 'Pinball' Kitsuragi...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fine. I'm Kim 'Pinball' Kitsuragi." he puts them back on. "AKA The Kimball. You remembered -- congratulations."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""End of story.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "End of story."

fields.Title: You: ""What about that other one -- the F..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What about that other one -- the Franconigerian Ball. Wanna play that?"

fields.Title: Half Light: "What a dumb name -- Royalist Pinbal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What a dumb name -- Royalist Pinball. If they weren't broken, he would kick one of these machines about now.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "It's strange that he doesn't like p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's strange that he doesn't like pinball. Kim here is a Seolite. His people are incredibly dextrous, and they all *love* pinball. Matter of fact...

fields.Title: Volition: "Stop."
fields.Dialogue Text: Stop.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Unbelievably," he nods. "To do tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Unbelievably," he nods. "To do that I needed to become a... *pinball champion*. I trained for nine months. The job was successful and I was moved out of the juvenile wing -- to homicide."

fields.Title: Empathy: "So that's why he doesn't want to ta..."
fields.Dialogue Text: So that's why he doesn't want to talk to Cuno. Trauma-and-Stressor Disorder from being a juvie cop.

fields.Title: You: "Run your finger across the dust of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Run your finger across the dust of the 'White Deora' machine.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Us *guys*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Us *guys*?"

fields.Title: You: ""You're Kim 'Pinball' Kitsuragi.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're Kim 'Pinball' Kitsuragi."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What?"

fields.Title: You: ""Lame.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lame."

fields.Title: Untitled hub
Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, I love it -- I love pinball. W..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, I love it -- I love pinball. Who doesn't love pinball? Let's move on."

fields.Title: You: ""You know -- Seol guys. Massive pin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You know -- Seol guys. Massive pinball people."

fields.Title: You: ""You were a juvie cop for 15 years?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You were a juvie cop for 15 years?"

fields.Title: You: ""Okay.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay."

fields.Title: You: ""Sounds like you don't enjoy pinbal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sounds like you don't enjoy pinball, Kim."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay."

fields.Title: You: ""Don't worry, I'll keep calling you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't worry, I'll keep calling you Kim."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It was not okay. I needed to becom..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was not okay. I needed to become a... *pinball champion*." He shudders. "I trained for 9 months. The job was successful and I was moved out of the juvenile wing -- to homicide."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Feels like it might jump back to li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Feels like it might jump back to life any moment, the lights illuminating the white robed woman.

fields.Title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Discard thought.]

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No human being should. It is a gam..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No human being should. It is a game that requires no skill and a childlike affinity to flashing lights. And to *fantastique*, science fiction, and historic romance franchises."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm gonna call you *Kimball* now.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm gonna call you *Kimball* now."

fields.Title: You: ""What's 'White Deora'?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's 'White Deora'?"

fields.Title: Drama: "He doesn't."
fields.Dialogue Text: He doesn't.

fields.Title: You: ""Hey, didn't you guys, like, *inven..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey, didn't you guys, like, *invent* pinball?"

fields.Title: You: ""Hey, Kimball.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey, Kimball."

fields.Title: You: ""Then why are you called Pinball?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then why are you called Pinball?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He puts his glasses back on. "Fine...."
fields.Dialogue Text: He puts his glasses back on. "Fine. I was a juvenile police officer -- for over 15 years. It's how I started out in the RCM. Once I had to infiltrate a pinball ring. As you do -- when you're a juvie cop."

fields.Title: You: ""How about we fire one of these bad..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How about we fire one of these bad boys up and play some ball?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Some kind of..." He looks around,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Some kind of..." He looks around, thinking. "Inane pinball theme -- probably related to Messina during the Dolorian age. The *history themes* are the worst."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Seol is an *extremely* protectioni..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Seol is an *extremely* protectionist isola, inaccessible to the rest of mankind. As it has been for over a thousand years. I have no special knowledge of them, despite my heritage."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. *They're* not -- let's move on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. *They're* not -- let's move on. There's more to this place than pinball machines."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That time is over now." He looks a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That time is over now." He looks at the pinball machine and breathes in. "I was already a 38 year old man. It was unbecoming. As was playing pinball."

fields.Title: Variable["yard.cuno_greeting_done"] == true
Variable["yard.cuno_greeting_done"] == true
!(Variable["yard.cuno_greeting_done"] == true)
You: ""You don't seem to really 'like' pi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You don't seem to really 'like' pinball."

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, but I still can't remember a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, but I still can't remember anything *else*."
